transcript:
Hello?
Hello, good afternoon sir.
Good afternoon.
Ye meri baat staff furniture se ho rahi hai?
Ji, bataye.
Shubham ji se right? Shubham ji mera naam Parash hai India Mart ke head office se baat kar raha tha business sales se kal baat hui thi kuch do din pehle lagta hai.
Okay, ji Parash ji bataye.
Actually mere pass aap logo ka ek complaint aaya hai regarding the issue wo refund ke liye aapne request dala tha mere pass, right sir?
Hanji, hanji.
Ji ji, so actually maine wo concern sir aap logo ka escalate karke aage forward kiya hua hai, right sir? Isliye ek din de dijiye some time because jo hamari team hai wo pehle isko check karne ke liye review karenge right? Ho sakta hai aapke pass meri senior ki call bhi aayegi regarding this. Okay? To wo aap call attend karke na apna jo bhi issue hai jo aapne kal mujhe bataya tha ki aapko kya kya bola gaya tha right? Aur kya kya commitment kiye gaye the pure nahi kiye gaye the wo aap unhe escalate kijiyega. Theek hai na? To wo usi ke basis pe fir wo aage usko review karke forward kar denge. Hamare jo aapne Indian issue mujhe bataya tha jaise ke you were promised that I will get my price worth within one one month but it's been 15 days right? We are not getting any maturity. Secondly investment ka koi use nahi hua I start consuming budget when none of it is useful. Unlimited calls aapko call promise ki gayi thi jo ki single call nahi aayi hai right? I will get I am getting promise dot I get. So whatever it is mentioned hai wo aapka usi ke regarding wo log call karenge. To sir aap dekhiyega.
Okay.
Actually maine aapne abhi concern open kiya hai na concern mere pass hi aata hai aapke issue ko highlight karne ke liye right? Ye to aapne mujhe kal mail par bhej hi diya tha right? To jo mail ko bheja aur aapne ticket open kiya dono same hi cheez hai mere pass. Okay okay. Isko alag nahi hai. Okay? So aapko request ye hai ki sir agar aapko further koi status ya kuch chahiye ho right? To meri mail ID hai aap usse chahe to puch lijiye right? Ya fir aapka whatsapp pe kaunsa number rehta hai mujhe wo bataiye please.
Same number hai.
Ek baar repeat karenge actually office number se call hai to mere ko number. Okay okay I got it 7518.
Han.
766.
Han.
790.
Ye number ek second hoga. Ye bhi maine aapko ek message dala raha hu unko.
Yahi hoga.
Aaya message?
Hanji, hanji aa gaya.
Mujhe 0977 ha reply kar dijiye haji haji na. Fir main communication me rahenge. To actually kya hai ki abhi main usko review ke liye jo maine aage forward karna hai sir ko right? Wo ek baar aapka mail review karenge uske baad me jo bhi final decision hai wo de denge aapko bata denge. Okay. Kyuki total decision unke upar depend karta hai ki aap jaise unhe batate ho jo bhi rehta hai theek hai?
Okay.
Sure, sure.
Okay sir. Main concern aapka close kar du sir if you don't mind jo ye open hai mere pass.
Dekh lijiye in jo best rahe.
Aap iske aap iske liye befikar rahiye kyuki jo aapne problem bataya right? Wo to already aage escalate ho hi raha hai right? Aur agar aapko kuch bhi puchna ho abhi maine isme aapko apna number diya aap mujhe directly connect kar lena ya whatsapp pe ping kar dena I will reply you jo bhi chal raha hoga.
Sure.
Theek hai. Okay. Thank you. Okay ji. Mera feedback aayega sir aapke pass ticket se. To wo feedback please mere regarding share kar dijiye.
Theek hai main kar deta hu.
Thank you sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a refund.

- Promised price worth not received within one month.

- No unlimited calls as promised.



Resolution:

- Executive escalated the concern to senior team.

- Senior team will review the issue.

- Executive shared his WhatsApp number for further communication.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to attend call from senior team.

- Customer to share feedback regarding the call.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, calls, escalation
